name: The Metronomicon - Deck the Dubstep
detailed_description:
I know it isn't Christmas yet, but we just couldn't wait!
Santa came early, and left Free DLC under the tree for you!

This Christmas DLC is a single-song pack.
It doesn't have an arena challenge, and there isn't any gear to unlock...
But, it does have... some experiments. Some... oddities.

It's... let's say, New.

Playable in Freeplay Mode and Story Modes, here comes "Deck The Dubstep", by Andross!

Getcho festive hat on!!!

short_description: I know it isn't Christmas yet, but we just couldn't wait! Santa came early, and left Free DLC under the tree for you!

fullgame.name: The Metronomicon: Slay The Dance Floor

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processeur : Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : 2 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Espace disque : 2500 MB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Notes supplémentaires : You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Intel-based Mac running Mac OS X 10.7.3 (Lion) or later
  • Processeur : Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : 2 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Espace disque : 2500 MB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Notes supplémentaires : You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)
